entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Dunchurch
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:58 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.3°C

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
